about_the_game:
Beautiful minimalist design and a relaxing atmosphere


Hex Picross was assembled with a beautiful and relaxing minimalist design
Made with relaxing visual and sound effects
In addition to music prepared exclusively

How to play


You need to click on the hexagonal cells to make them colored
Each diagonal and column counts how many colored cells there are
Your challenge is to find all the intersections between columns and diagonals
With this, they will decrease their number and will be equal to zero.
When all are equal to zero, you've won the game.

Many Difficulty Levels

  • 3x3x3 - 40 Levels
  • 4x4x4 - 40 Levels
  • 5x5x5 - 40 Levels
  • 6x6x6 - 40 Levels
  • 7x7x7- 40 Levels
  • 9x9x9 - 40 Levels

Resources

  • Minimalist: no timer and no pressure, solve puzzles in your own time
  • Premium: 240 carefully chosen levels
  • Zen: Zen and relaxing sound environment
  • Dark Mode: Perfect if you can't stare at the white screen for too long
  • Steam Cloud and Steam Achivements
detailed_description:
UPDATE WITH YOUR FEEDBACK

We appreciate your feedback, with it we change the game for better:

We created a new game design, now the game is more like hexagon nonogram

For this, all levels have been recreated:

  • The game continue with 240 levels
  • The levels are separeted in 6 difficult modes
  • The levels is no more randomic
  • Each level create images and pictures

Other changes that you requested:


  • Now you can click on right mouse button to select a "negative" cell
  • Now you can click on the column to highlight it
  • Now you can resize the window mode
  • A game tutorial to learn hexagon picross

UPDATE CALENDAR:
  • September 1st: New Game Design with 3x3x3 and 4x4x4 levels
  • September 2nd: 5x5x5 Levels and tutorial
  • September 5nd: 7x7x7 Levels
  • September 7nd: 6x6x6 Levels
  • September 19nd: 9x9x9 Levels

For more suggestions, you can use the game community to contact us
We hope you always have a good experience with our games

short_description: Hex PiCross is a picross game built on a hexagonal grid with a beautiful minimalist design and a uniquely prepared soundscape. Click to color the hexagonal cells so that all columns and diagonals are zero.
